Package controller

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
controller.AdminController
public class AdminController
extends java.lang.Object
Admin Controller used to connect the Admin.fxml View to Models.
Author:
Naveenan Yogeswaran, Savan Patel

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) Admin admin
    Reference to Admin who has reference to all Users.

    Reference to primaryStage used to display all our scenes.

    List View that is used to show list of users.
    private javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> users
    ObservableList used to populate userListView and to keep track of new changes.

    • deleteConfirmation

      public boolean deleteConfirmation​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, java.lang.String username)
      Asks User to confirm Deletion of User.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - Reference to primaryStage used to display all our scenes.
      username - The username of the User that is to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if User confirms action; False if User cancels action
